movies.title: Rakuen Tsuiho: Expelled from Paradise
movies.plot: With Earth now left in ruins following the "Nano Hazard," most of humanity has abandoned the planet they once called home along with their physical bodies and rebuilt their digitalized minds into a society within the cyber universe of "DEVA." A.D. 2400, DEVA's central council detects an incident of unauthorized access into their mainframe. Someone on Earth was trying to hack into the system. The only information DEVA was able to retrieve was that the hacker referred to themselves as "Frontier Setter." To investigate the mysterious hacker's motives, the high officials of DEVA dispatch System Security Third Officer Angela Balzac to the Earth's surface. Equipped with a prosthetic "material body," Angela attempts to make contact with a local agent Dingo, but what awaited her instead was a swarm of Sandworms now infesting the Earth's surface. Angela intercepts the gruesome pests with her exoskeletal powered suit Arhan. Will Angela and Dingo be able to find Frontier Setter on this ...
movies.simplePlot: With Earth now left in ruins following the "Nano Hazard," most of humanity has abandoned the planet they once called home along with their physical bodies and rebuilt their digitalized ...

biography.bio: Rie Kugimiya was born on May 30, 1979 in Kumamoto, Japan. She is an actress, known for Gintama (2006), Toradora! (2008) and Shakugan no Shana III: Final (2011).
biography.name: Rie Kugimiya

biography.bio: Wendee Lee was born on February 20, 1960 in Los Angeles, California, USA. She is known for her work on Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust (2000), Mighty Morphin Power Rangers (1993) and Resident Evil: Damnation (2012).
biography.name: Wendee Lee

biography.bio: Steve Blum was born on April 29, 1960 in Santa Monica, California, USA as Steven Jay Blum. He is an actor and writer, known for Digimon: Digital Monsters (1999), Batman: Arkham City (2011) and Star Wars Rebels (2014).
biography.name: Steve Blum

biography.bio: Shin'ichirô Miki was born on March 18, 1968 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002).
biography.name: Shin'ichirô Miki

biography.bio: Johnny Yong Bosch was born on January 6, 1976 in Kansas City, Missouri, USA as John Jay Bosch. He is known for his work on Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion (2006), Bleach (2004) and Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie (1995). He has been married to Amy Bosch since March 21, 2003. They have two children.
biography.name: Johnny Yong Bosch

biography.bio: Hiroshi Kamiya was born on January 28, 1975 in Chiba, Japan. He is an actor, known for Polar Bear's Café (2012), Noragami (2014) and Trigun (1998).
biography.name: Hiroshi Kamiya

biography.bio: Megumi Hayashibara was born on March 30, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001) and Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997). She has been married to Amiya Masaharu since April 30, 1998.
biography.name: Megumi Hayashibara

biography.bio: Brina Palencia was born as Brina Michelle Palencia. She is an Honduran-American actress and director, known for One Piece (1999), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009), The Walking Dead (2010), and Star-Crossed (2014). Growing up, she split her time between Honduras and the United States. She is fluent in both English and Spanish.
biography.name: Brina Palencia

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Megan Hollingshead was born on September 22, 1968 in New York City, New York, USA as Megan T.D. Hollingshead. She is known for her work on Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and The Last of Us (2013).
biography.name: Megan Hollingshead

biography.bio: Minami Takayama was born on May 5, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan as Arai Izumi. She is an actress and composer, known for Conan le detective (1996), Kiki's Delivery Service (1989) and Si tu tends l'oreille (1995). She was previously married to Gôshô Aoyama.
biography.name: Minami Takayama

biography.bio: Kotono Mitsuishi was born on December 8, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Sailor Moon (1992), Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance (2009) and Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997).
biography.name: Kotono Mitsuishi

biography.bio: Beau Billingslea was born on September 1, 1953 in Charleston, South Carolina, USA as John Daniel Billingslea Jr. He is an actor and producer, known for General Hospital (1963), Star Trek Into Darkness (2013) and Santa Barbara (1984). He is married to Cecelia Marie Thompson. They have two children.
biography.name: Beau Billingslea

biography.bio: Minoru Inaba was born on November 8, 1951 in Shizuoka, Japan as Masami Kawaguchi. He is an actor, known for Beast King GoLion (1981), Rakuen Tsuiho: Expelled from Paradise (2014) and Rurouni Kenshin: Wandering Samurai (1996).
biography.name: Minoru Inaba

biography.bio: Hisao Egawa was born on September 13, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto the Last: Le film (2014) and Engine Squadron Go-onger (2008).
biography.name: Hisao Egawa

biography.bio: Kirk Thornton was born on May 13, 1956 in Portland, Oregon, USA. He is known for his work on Digimon: Digital Monsters (1999), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Akira (1988). He is married to Julie Nesbitt. They have two children.
biography.name: Kirk Thornton

camera: Arri Alexa Plus 4:3, Panavision Primo and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
